job_title: Husky Energy Co-op / Internship Student Opportunities
job_description: Husky Energy is one of Canada’s largest integrated energy companies. Based in Calgary, Alberta, it is publicly traded on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol HSE and HSE.PR.A. Husky and its more than 5,000 employees operate in Western and Atlantic Canada, the United States and the Asia Pacific Region, with Upstream and Downstream business segments.The positions below list the preferred discipline, the area, and requisition number that can be searched on the Husky Careers website.Engineering – Lloydminster:Mechanical – Technical Services – req#13912Potential Opportunity: Electrical - Technical ServicesEngineering – Saskatoon:Mechanical – Asphalt – Pounder Operations– req#13906Engineering – Cold Lake/Tucker:Potential Opportunity: Mechanical –Production EngineeringEngineering – Calgary:Chemical– Taber/Hussar– req#13889Petroleum/Chemical/Mechanical – Production Engineering – req#13894Chemical – Facilities Engineering – req#13904Petroleum/Chemical/Mechanical – Saskatchewan SWOP Reservoir Engineering – req#Petroleum/Chemical/Mechanical – Thermal South & Emerging Oil Sands Reservoir Engineering – req#13905Business – Calgary:Public Relations/Communications/Journalism – Corporate Communications – req# 13901Computer Science – Calgary:Infrastructure Solutions – req#13903Desk Side Support/ IS Customer Experience Management– req#13902Other:Reclamation and Remediation - Upstream Environment Operations – Lloydminster – req#13883Instrumentation – Lloydminster – req#13900
job_requirements: ***Please click on the link below to apply***www.huskyenergy.com/careers/careeropportunities/canada.asp Only students who apply directly online to Husky’s website will be considered Positions posted on the Husky website December 12, 2014 Application deadline is January 31, 2015 or until the position has been filled All candidates must be enrolled in a co-op / internship program Only those students selected for an interview will be contacted Applications without recent unofficial transcripts and proof of enrolment in a co-op program will not be consideredOpen To All Majors:No
